entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
